document_data.mainbody:
he Sea of Shilarn was a famous ship of Waterdeep on the Sea of Swords from the citys early maritime history. It was named for Shilarn Silmaeril, one of the early Lords of Waterdeep.
By the early 14 century DR, a beautiful and detailed model of the Sea of Shilarn was displayed in the hall of ships in the House of the Moon temple to Sel√ªne in Waterdeep.
